value:
It's up to me to plot a course to a
bright new age. Of course, I'm happy
to apply my experience here too.

I'll leave Fódlan in Teach's hands
while I try to change things beyond
its borders. Hope it all works out.

At a certain point you have to put
the pen down and put schemes into
action, ready or not.$k$p...What, not persuasive coming
from me?

Fighting for your life day after day
is exhausting to both body and mind.
I suggest grand post-battle feasts!

Whether it's battle or governing, if
you stick to the old ways, you never
break out of the same tired patterns.
Even I have room to grow.

Getting a little stronger is never
a bad thing.
Well, no use panicking at this point...

With this power, I'll plot a course
to a bright new age.

I'm Claude von Riegan. Though...I no
longer introduce myself as a Riegan.
Or as Claude, as a matter of fact.

I never had much faith in gods or
goddesses, $Nu.$k$pBut now, seeing godlike folks isn't
out of the ordinary. That's what it
seems like, anyway.$k$pDo you believe in destiny? Like the
kind of miraculous encounters that
change your life?$k$pSurprise meetings that are somehow
inevitable at the same time? You get
what I'm saying, don't you?$k$pI feel that my meeting you was part
of my destiny. Maybe even a miracle
of some god's design...$k$pWell, if that god knows how I feel,
they'll know I ought to stick with you
a while longer, for a brighter future.
らあっ！
せりゃあっ！
ごわあっ
やってくれる…！
I won't back down!
Ready or not, here it comes!
Hold a grudge if you must.
Leave. Now.
Sorry, but...it's up to you now.
Yes?
Nobles and commoners are equals here...that suits me just fine.
Don't spook me like that! I'm just mixing up some peaceful poisons, don't mind me.
I have to believe this path leads to the sight I dream of seeing...
A good general doesn't count on luck to win the day.
If worrying's your thing, have at it. Otherwise, let's feast!
I think the world would be better off without borders, but that's just me...
I want to know more about you... Um, not in a creepy way. I just find you intriguing!
Sure thing.
What's this?
Let's go!
